title: Peanut butter and caramel chocolate chip cookies
ingredients: ['260g plain flour', '2 teaspoons corn flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon sea salt flakes', '250g butter', '150g light brown sugar', '75g caster sugar', '2 free-range eggs, whisked', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract or 1 teaspoon vanilla bean paste', '225g chocolate chips or roughly chopped chocolate', '2 tablespoons crunchy peanut butter (optional, see tip)', '2 tablespoons dulce de leche (optional, see tip)']
